body.name: Original Penguin Crimson 21" Hardside Carry-on Spinner Luggage,Telescoping Handles, Metallic Blue, One Size
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 22 hrs 41 mins
features: 8 wheel, 360 degree spinning wheel system for easy maneuverability
Interior features mesh organization pocket and tie down straps
body.description: With the crimson 21" hard side carry-on luggage, you can keep your luggage with you from home, airplane, to destination. Made of lightweight, durable hard side material, you'll be at ease knowing your clothing and accessories will be safe. And you'll be able to zip through the terminal with the 8 wheel, 360 degree spinner system and aluminum trolley handle. So pack your things and travel with luggage from Original Penguin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Classic Penguin Design This stylish and sturdy design is classically Penguin. The 21" Crimson carry-on luggage is constructed of lightweight and durable material with a rigid texture shell, an aluminum trolley handle, and double spinner wheels for easy transport.

Expandable Feature The expandable feature will give you 15% more packing capacity. It does not matter whether you are a frequent flyer, weekend traveler, or occasional vacationer, expandable luggage is an essential part of modern travel Multi-directional spinner wheels High quality multi-directional spinner wheels are easy to maneuver and make traveling in style a breeze, thanks to its eight 360-degree spinner wheels. Lined Interior Fully imprinted interior lining, along with two interior zippered mesh pockets. Main compartment includes tie down straps to secure contents and prevent shifting while traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travelling in Style!
reviews.reviewText: The Original Penguin Crimson 21" Hardside Carry-on is a stylish and practical luggage option for travelers. Its durable hardside construction ensures your belongings are well-protected during your journeys. The compact 21" size meets most airline carry-on restrictions, providing convenience and saving you time at the airport. The interior features ample space and organization pockets to keep your items neatly arranged. The spinner wheels and telescopic handle allow for smooth maneuverability, reducing strain on your arm. With its vibrant crimson color and iconic Original Penguin logo, this carry-on adds a touch of personality to your travels. The Original Penguin Crimson 21" Hardside Carry-on is a reliable and eye-catching choice for your next trip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and quality
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for a trip to Europe as it fits the requirements for a carry-on in Europe. We have 2 of these. They were dragged around Europe for over 2 weeks and have held up well. We had no problems. The wheels held up well and were easy to push/pull around. You can also squish a lot of clothes in these things!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Excellent Carry-on
reviews.reviewText: Used this luggage on a recent flight and it is great! Carried on one-way, checked on the way home without a problem. The wheels run smoothly, it’s well-balanced no toppeling, zippers work great, and fits more than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Suitcase, Not Great
reviews.reviewText: Suitcase arrived quickly and I used it once as a carry on of course. It's Polycarbonate/ABS mix which is essentially a top of the line material mixed with less durable material. That's odd! This luggage will scratch and take some hits, but so will most in the price range. No big deal. Secondly, I measured 21 x 13 x 10 without the extension feature. The color is great, the wheels feels like it's gliding, the inside compartments are pretty standard for hardside luggage but probably the best part. The handle appears flimsy but works fine, but I would avoid lifting the bag using the extendable handle, which I tend to do. I think if you're mindful of not throwing it around, it should last 2-3 years, based on frequency of travel. So far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Great product, very happy with purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for weak wrists!
reviews.reviewText: Previously had a suitcase that only had 2 wheels, so it needed to be titled in order for it to roll, which left me with painful wrists. Tried this on a recent trip, oh my goodness! This suitcase glides like it's an ice skate on an ice rink. No more strain on my wrists!The outside look sharp too!One negative. The inside zippers are very fragile and the separators for the different compartments are made of very lightweight material. With careful use of the inside zippers and compartments, this is a great choice!We will be purchasing another one and we highly recommend! Very satisfied with our choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Zipper alignment off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Inner zipper is very flimsy.
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking suitcase but inner zipper ripped after only three months of traveling.
Es una muy buena opción, es de buen tamaño, comparada con las samsonite que dicen ser carry on.Los colores y acabados están muy bien. 100% satisfecho con la compra
Love this little luggage. Rolls well, light weight and meets on board carry on size. I love the colour too and the two separate compartments inside

La maleta está muy bonita pero se ve que la tenían guardada en un lugar muy sucio ya que llegó llena de polvo
